extendedInfo.description: Will you have enough to retire on? Will your pension income be a fraction of what you earn today?The C-MG DC Pension application helps to model your future pensions.Enter your data and shake it to refresh the fields, using the accelerometer.Fixes- db fix- connection settings updatedHave fun.

reviews.title: Intuitive & easy to use
reviews.comment: This pensions planner app is intuitive and has all of the necessary options with useful explanations to make it very easy to model my pension.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Doesn\'t show income
reviews.comment: Basically this is just a compound interest calc. The pension income calculation  doesn\'t work, my calculations came back with pension pot of \302\243650k but an income of 0.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good but income retirement doesn\'t appear to be live.
reviews.comment: This app is great as a compound interest calculator.  It will show you how big your pension pot will be.  It doesn\'t appear to be linked to up to date annuity rates and as such over estimates how much you will get. Please can we get it linked to live annuity rates.   Can we also have an option to enter monthly payments to the pot rather than just a percentage of annual salary. I will pay for the app if you can.  Thanks Dominic.  Rich
reviews.author: Richard Prescott

reviews.comment: I like this, now I can prepare my pension for the future
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: This is by far the best DC modeller I have ever seen on Android. HTC Desire
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Albert Barieto
reviews.comment: Helped me see the income I get when I retire, so now I know what to save. Pretty cool
reviews.author: Dominic Carlyle

reviews.title: Tesco
reviews.comment: Brilliant app, now i know when to retire
reviews.author: A Google User
